description:
Whenever Kotarou goes to see the neighborhood dentist, Dr. Ooba always takes the time to talk to him and ask him lots of questions.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Tokubetsu na Jikan / Shishou Jikiden / Welcome na Hito / Makura no Omoide / Shinjiterutte yo / Kawaranai Mono
特別な時間 / 師匠直伝 / ウェルカムな人 / 枕の思い出 / 信じてるってよ / 変わらないもの
